attributes.action: Remove the ban on calling out provable lies in Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Because the system is broken. MPs get into more trouble for trying to call out lies than the people who are actually misleading the British public.
attributes.background: Introduce some semblance of accountability on the statements made in parliament by allowing MPs to accuse members of making provably false statements.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607678
